Reviews.Title: “Convenient and clean”

Reviews.Content: october 2011 days fine clean quiet travelling 65 euros double bed sufficiently bathroom shower desk breakfast expensive 14 euros buffet diverse complete albeit lonely people lost cafés restaurants tram stop front hotel airport tegel takes 45 minutes hotel hotel basic convenient

Reviews.Title: “Outstanding value !”
Reviews.Author: Casualist
Reviews.Content: whilst hardly sits comfortably luxury standards hotels pricewise cant beaten weekend 35 eur october breakfast included outside centre door ubahn station trains 10 minutes centre journey 15 minutes station totally safe late night couple stops airport bus tegel lots snack kiosks currywurst ethnic restaurants turkish indian chinese fast food joints burger king outside station dining hotel flight path tegel heard planes basic clean staff wonderfully friendly id stay buy allday travelcard commute tofrom centre stay expensive central hotel
